Welcome to Todo-List!

Stay organized and manage your tasks effectively with our simple and intuitive todo app.
Whether you're juggling work, personal projects, or daily chores, our app helps you stay on top of everything.

Key Features:

  • Create and manage multiple projects to organize your tasks
  • Add, edit, and delete todos with ease
  • Set due dates and prioritize tasks based on importance
  • Mark todos as completed and track your progress
  • Stay focused and productive with a clean and clutter-free interface
